@NotLikeFreddy I give it a week before I crack and use oil, though.
@NotLikeFreddy Actually I don't eat a lot of meat. That's the easiest part for me!
@NotLikeFreddy Technically it's no ADDED salt, fat, or sugar. meat, gluten, and dairy free. On a scale of 1–10 how horrified are you?
@NotLikeFreddy It's OK. I still think you're alright.
@NotLikeFreddy She bought me an “SOS” cookbook—no salt, oil, or sugar. I promised I would try it. She would not thank you at aaaaall.
@NotLikeFreddy I promised my mum I would use less salt. Are you in-salting my family? MY FAMILY, PAUL?
@NotLikeFreddy WHAT ARE YOU GOING TO DO ABOUT IT PAUL
